Title: Italy’s Rovigo increases LNG sendout, receives LNG cargo as weather improves
Description: Italy’s 5.6 mtpa Rovigo LNG received its first LNG cargo in almost a week yesterday as gas sendout into the grid also rose with an improvement in weather conditions in the northern Adriatic Sea.
Author: CK

Title: Bangladesh’s RPGCL seeks one early April LNG cargo
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. Ltd. has issued a tender to buy one LNG cargo for delivery on Apr. 6-7 to either of the country’s two 3.8 mtpa floating LNG import terminals, the Excelerate-operated Moheshkhali LNG or Summit Group-operated Summit LNG, in Moheshkhali. The tender closes on Mar. 5.
Author: CK

Title: Argentina’s Enarsa seeks one April LNG cargo for Escobar, adds to earlier 30-cargo purchase
Description: Argentina’s state-owned energy firm Enarsa has issued a tender to buy one cargo for delivery to its 6.1 mtpa Escobar LNG receiving terminal on Apr. 12-16. The tender closes on Mar. 8.
Author: CK

Title: Angola LNG offers a late-March to first-half April LNG cargo
Description: Angola LNG has issued a tender to sell one cargo from its 5.2 mtpa Soyo LNG plant for delivery between Mar. 28 and Apr. 14. The tender closes on Mar. 8.
Author: CK

Title: EemsEnergyTerminal needs “fine-tuning” but is moving towards full capacity: Gasunie
Description: The Gasunie-operated 5.9 mtpa EemsEnergy LNG Terminal at Eemshaven in the Netherlands will need some tweaks but is operating at full capacity, with most of the commissioning work on the terminal now completed.
Author: CK
